com.reactivecascade.functional

Class StateMachine<IN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reactivecascade.functional.StateMachine<IN>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INamed

    public class StateMachine<IN>
extends java.lang.Object
implements INamed
    Thread-safe state machine which performs a specified action on each upstream change of the underlying state

    Created by Paul Houghton on 3/28/2015.
